name: Pack Your Stuff [Demo]
description:
Enjoy the calming experience of packing your room into cardboard boxes. This game demo was inspired by my recent life event: helping my parents move out of my childhood home. 

I hope you enjoy the zen and relaxing feeling of packing your childhood belongings. Let me know if you'd like to see this demo expanded to a full game.

Disclaimer: This is my first game, and I made it in one week. 

Controls 

Move: WASD

Pick-up object: Mouse click

Credits

Unity Game Engine

Music: Fesliyan Studios

3d Models: Layer Lab

Publisher: indifferentbroccoli.com
